# Pull Request ‚Äì Crispy Maps

Thank you for your contribution!  
Please review the checklist below and note how contributions are handled in this repository.

---

‚ö†Ô∏è **Important Notes**

This repository is a **mirror** of our internal GitLab instance.  
We **cannot merge pull requests directly on GitHub**.

If your contribution is accepted, we will:

- Manually import your changes into our internal GitLab repo.
- Ensure your **original commit attribution is preserved**.
- Close the PR here once the code is merged internally and mirrored back to GitHub.

We appreciate your contribution and your understanding of this process! üíô

---

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the project's code style.
- [ ] I have tested the changes and verified that they work as intended.
- [ ] I understand that my PR may be imported manually and will not be merged directly.

(Optional)
- [ ] This PR addresses an existing GitHub Issue: #__
